mapper.select: SELECT QUESTION_ID, USER_ID, QUESTION_TITLE, QUESTION_CONTENT, QUESTION_REGISTER_DATETIME, QUESTION_IS_PUBLIC, QUESTION_LIKE_COUNT, DOCTOR_DEPARTMENT_TYPE, READ_COUNT FROM TBL_QUESTION WHERE ROWNUM > #{page} * 10 AND ROWNUM <= #{page} * 10 + 10

SELECT QUESTION_ID, Q.USER_ID, QUESTION_TITLE, QUESTION_CONTENT, QUESTION_REGISTER_DATETIME, QUESTION_IS_PUBLIC, QUESTION_LIKE_COUNT, DOCTOR_DEPARTMENT_TYPE, READ_COUNT, U.USER_NAME FROM TBL_USER U JOIN TBL_QUESTION Q ON U.USER_ID = Q.USER_ID AND QUESTION_ID = #{questionId}
